title: Romulan Incursion
content: Romulan Bird-of-Prey attacked Federation installations Outpost 2, Outpost 3, Outpost 4 and Outpost 8. Outposts 2, 3 and 8 were destroyed. The USS Enterprise under Captain James T. Kirk set out to rendezvous at Outpost 4 to provide assistance. Upon approach, the Enterprise was attacked by the Bird-of-Prey. After a skirmish, the Enterprise critically damaged the Bird-of-Prey. Rather than surrender to the Federation, the Romulan commander initiated self-destruct, thereby ensuring his ship and crew would not be captured.
